name: Planetary Adaptation
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the Stars © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as planar adaptation, except that it works only on worlds of the Material Plane. The cold void of space is considered a single world for the purpose of this spell, allowing you to survive in vacuum.you immunity to the harmful environmental effects of a particular plane of existence, including such hazards as toxicity, extreme temperatures, and lack of air.
text_zh: 此法术如同位面适应(planar adaptation，APG P.236)般作用，除了它只能用在主物质位面世界。在决定法术的目标时，寒冷虚空的太空被认为是一个世界，令你可以在真空中生存。
